trans-unit.source: **Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> objects.
This collection is used as part of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup"></xref> to apply multiple bitmap effects to visual content.
trans-unit.target: Questo insieme viene utilizzato come parte di un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup"> </xref> per applicare più effetti bitmap al contenuto visivo.

trans-unit.source: **Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: **Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref> class using the given collection.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"> </xref> classe utilizzando l'insieme specificato.

trans-unit.source: The collection used for initialization.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref> class with a specified capacity, or the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> objects the collection is initially capable of storing.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"> </xref> classe con una capacità specificata o il numero di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"> </xref> è inizialmente in grado di memorizzare la raccolta di oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The initial capacity of the collection.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> at the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"> </xref> alla fine della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> to add to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"> </xref> da aggiungere alla fine della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: **Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Removes all effects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove tutti gli effetti dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto clonato <> </> *> proprietà sarà <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> anche se l'origine <> </> *> era di proprietà<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto clonato <> </> *> proprietà sarà <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> anche se l'origine <> </> *> proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Indicates whether the collection contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indica se la raccolta contiene l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo esegue una ricerca lineare. Pertanto, il tempo medio di esecuzione è proporzionale al <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: That is, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è un'operazione O (*n*) operazione, in cui *n* è <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method determines equality by calling <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The bitmap effect to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Effetto bitmap da individuare nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: **true** if the collection contains value; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true** se la raccolta contiene il valore; in caso contrario, **false**.

trans-unit.source: **Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Copies the elements of the collection to an array starting at the given index.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli elementi della raccolta in una matrice a partire dall'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The array to copy to.
The collection index to begin coping.
trans-unit.target: Indice della raccolta per iniziare la copia.

trans-unit.source: **Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Gets the number of effects contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di contenuti in effetti il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of effects contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di contenuti in effetti il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un enumeratore che può scorrere la raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection.Enumerator> that can iterate through the collection.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Retrieves the index of the first instance of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Recupera l'indice della prima istanza dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The effect to find in the collection.
The index of the specified effect.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Inserts a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> into this collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"> </xref> in questa raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The index to insert the effect at.
The specified effect to insert.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> to get or set.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"> </xref> da ottenere o impostare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> at the specified index.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Removes the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> for this collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove la prima occorrenza dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"> </xref> per questa raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The effect to remove from the collection
if value was removed; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if value was removed; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: **Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index of the effect to remove.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: E può essere utilizzato solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection>esegue il cast dell'istanza di un <xref:System.Collections.IList>interfaccia.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero dell'elemento da ottenere o impostare.

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per una descrizione di questo membro, vedere <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un'implementazione esplicita dell'interfaccia di un membro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to remove from the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref>.
